DESCRIPTION_BY_MONTH: Monthly orderd resource can not be deleted before it's expire date, more details。
PROMPT_MESSAGE_STOP_MACHINE: Are you sure you want to shutdown?
PROMPT_MESSAGE_STOP_MACHINE_FORCE: Force shutdown, will directly cut power and may cause some data lose.
PROMPT_MESSAGE_CONFIRM_ACTION: Are you sure you want to make this operation?
DELETE_CONFIRM_BY_NAME: Delete operation is unrecoverable, please input it's name to confirm.
PROMPT_MESSAGE_SECURITY_GROUP_BIND: Select the security group to apply to {{name}}:
PROMPT_MESSAGE_SSH_KEYS_BIND: Select the ssh key to bind to machine {{name}}:
PROMPT_MESSAGE_VOLUMES_BIND: Select the volume to mount to machine {{name}}:
PROMPT_MESSAGE_WAN_IP_BIND: Select the floating IP to bind to {{name}}:
ERROR_MACHINE_PASSWORD: Password must contain capital and small letters, numbers and special characters at same time, and length between 8 ~ 32, special charactoers include .!@:#$%*()_+^&
PROMPT_MESSAGE_UNMOUNT_VOLUME: Are you sure you want to unmount this volume from machine {{name}} ({{id | shortId}})?
PROMPT_MESSAGE_MOUNT_VOLUME: Select the machine to mount volume {{name}}:
PROMPT_MESSAGE_CHANGE_VOLUME_SIZE:
Current volume capacity: {{size}} GB, Volume type: {{type | type:'volume' | translate}}, Pay Mode: {{cost_mode | type:'cost_mode' | translate}}
Capacity should be counting by 10 and between {{size}}-{{limit}}:
DESCRIPTION_VOLUME_CAPACITY: Capacity should be counting by 10 and between 10-{{limit}}:
NAME_PATTERN: Name should start with a letter, length should between 4 ~ 20, letters, numbers, - and _ are availiable.
NAME_PATTERN_40: Name should start with a letter, length should between 4 ~ 40, letters, numbers, - and _ are availiable.
PROMT_MESSAGE_DELETE_SECURITY_RULE: Delete operation is unrecoverable, are you sure you want to delete this rule?
SECURITY_RULE_PORT_RANGE_SPEC: Single number or range between 1 to 65535, like "22" or "5900-5990"
AUTH_MODAL_TITLE: Please input your account password to confirm this operation
PROMPT_MESSAGE_IP_BAND_VM_BIND: Bind floating IP {{address}} to selected machine:
PROMPT_MESSAGE_SSH_BAND_VM_BIND: Select the machine to bind ssh key {{name}}:
PROMPT_MESSAGE_SSH_UNBAND_VM_BIND: Select the machine to unbind ssh key {{name}}:
PROMPT_MESSAGE_RESET_MACHINE: Are you sure you want to reset machine {{name}} ({{id | shortId}}) by following image?
PROMPT_MESSAGE_MACHINE_CHANGE_FLAVOR: Machine {{machine.name}} current flavor is CPU: {{flavor.vcpus}} cores; RAM: {{flavor.ram * 1024 * 1024 | fileSize}}, please choose new flavor:
MACHINE_CREATE_SUCESS_WIN_NPW:
Machine's username: AdministratorInitial password: {{password}}
Please copy this password, it cannot be reset if you forgot!
MACHINE_CREATE_SUCESS_WIN:
Machine's username: AdministratorInitial password: {{password}}
Please keep it secure
MACHINE_CREATE_SUCESS_LINUX:
Machine's username: rootInitial password: {{password}}
Please keep it secure
DESCRIPTION_IP_BANDWIDTH_FIRST: Bandwith should be integer between 1-200, please input the bandwidth:
DESCRIPTION_ADJUST_IP_BANDWIDTH:
Current bandwidth is{{bandwidth | bandwidth:2:'K'}}; Pay mode is {{cost_mode | type:'cost_mode' | translate}}
Bandwith should be integer between 1-200, please input new bandwidth:
PROMPT_MESSAGE_VOLUME_SNAP_CREATE_IN_USE: Attention: this volume is in-use now, force to create snapshot may leads data inconsistency!
CREATE_VOLUME_BY_SNAP_INFO: You are using volume snapshot {{name}} ({{id}}) to create new volume
PROMPT_MESSAGE_UNBIND_IP: Are you sure you want to unbind this IP from machine {{name}} ({{id | shortId}})?
InternalError: An internal error has occurred. Retry your request, but if the problem persists, please contact us!
BadRequest: Request is incorrect. Refresh page and retry your request, but if the problem persists, please contact us!
AuthFailure: Your session has expired, please signin again.
InvalidParameter: A parameter specified in a request is not valid, is unsupported, or cannot be used!
InvalidUserType: Your account has no right to access EVM service. Please use Contact Us.
ResourceQuotaExceeded: Request quota exceeded for resources. Please contact us.
FlavorDiskTooSmall: Flavor's disk is too small for requested image!
ResizeRequireFlavorChange: Resize action requires a flavor change
AlreadyHasFloatingIp: Requested Machine or Port already has a floating ip.
VmActiveStateCantDo: Can't do while it is in active status. Please power off the machine
VmStoppedStateCantDo: Can't do while it is in stopped status. Please start the machine
VmErrorStateCantDo: Can't do while it is in error status. Please restart the machine
VmImageUploadingCantDo: Can't do while it is in image uploading. Please try again later.
VolumeHasSnapshot: Can't do because volume still has dependent snapshots
SecurityGroupRuleExist: Same security group rule already exists
UserShortBlocked: Your account is not allowed to login to much time in a short time.
CostMonthExceeded: Resource's total cost month is no permit to set more than 36.
VolumeAttachedCantDo: Volume is in attached state, please unmount it first.
ResourceCantModify: Resource's cost mode is on month or year, should not be modified or deleted.
ProtocolPortExist: Listener's protocol port already existed under this load balancer!
LbaasDeleteCAntDo: Cannot delete the load balancer with pool or the load balancer with listener!
PoolDeleteCAntDo: Cannot delete the pool with listener!
FEATURE_NOT_ENABLED_MESSAGE: Sorry, this feature is not avaiable in your selected region now.
SERVICE_NOT_AVAIABLE_DETAIL: Service is under maintenance and temporarily unavailable now. Please try again later or contact us.
CHANGE_TO_BY_MONTH_INFO: Current cost mode is On Demand, you can change it to By Month:
RENEW_INFO: Current cost mode is By Month, expired time is {{expired_time * 1000 | date:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'}}, you can renew it:
12MUNTH_EXTRA2: Buy EVM by year (buy 12 month one-time) to get 2 month time extra freely.
PROMT_MESSAGE_DELETE_POOL_MEMBER: Delete operation is unrecoverable, are you sure you want to remove this machine from this pool?
QUOTA_CHECK_WARNING_MSG: Quota {{key | translate}} is not enough! Click this message to apply more.
APPLY_MORE_QUOTA_MSG: Sorry, we do not accept this action from system, please contact us if you really need it.
AUDIT#_VM_CREATE: Create {{ args.cost_mode | type:'cost_mode' | translate }} Pay Mode Machine {{args.name}}({{resource_id | shortId}})
AUDIT#_VM_MOUNT_VOLUME: Mount Volume ({{target_id | shortId}}) to Machine ({{resource_id | shortId}})
AUDIT#_VM_CREATE_VM_SNAP: Create Machine Snapshot {{args.name}}({{target_id | shortId}}) for Machine ({{resource_id | shortId}})
AUDIT#_VM_BIND_FLOATIP: Bind IP ({{target_id | shortId}}) to Machine ({{resource_id | shortId}})
AUDIT#_VM_UNBIND_FLOATIP: Unbind IP ({{target_id | shortId}}) from Machine ({{resource_id | shortId}})
AUDIT#_VM_BIND_SECURITY_GROUP: Bind Security Group ({{target_id | shortId}}) to Machine ({{resource_id | shortId}})
AUDIT#_VM_UNBIND_SECURITY_GROUP: Unbind Security Group ({{target_id | shortId}}) from Machine ({{resource_id | shortId}})
AUDIT#_VM_BIND_SSH_KEYS: Bind SSH Key ({{target_id | shortId}}) to Machine ({{resource_id | shortId}})
AUDIT#_VM_UNBIND_SSH_KEYS: Unbind SSH Key ({{target_id | shortId}}) from Machine ({{resource_id | shortId}})
AUDIT#_COMMON_BYMONTH: Update {{resource_type | type:'resource_type' | translate}} ({{resource_id | shortId}}) Pay Mode to Monthly, and buy {{args.amount}} months
AUDIT#_VOLUME_CREATE_VOLUME_SNAP: Create Volume Snapshot {{args.name}}({{target_id | shortId}}) for Volume ({{resource_id | shortId}})
AUDIT#_VOLUME_CREATE: Create {{ args.cost_mode | type:'cost_mode' | translate }} {{args.volume_type.toUpperCase()}} pay Volume {{args.name}}({{resource_id | shortId}}) and size is {{args.size}}GB
AUDIT#_FLOATIP_UPDATE: Update Floating IP {{args.name}}({{resource_id | shortId}} bandwidth to {{args.rate_limit | bandwidth:2:'K'}}
AUDIT#_FLOATIP_CREATE: Create {{args.provider | translate}} {{ args.cost_mode | type:'cost_mode' | translate }} pay {{args.volume_type.toUpperCase()}} {{args.rate_limit | bandwidth:2:'K'}} Floating IP {{args.name}}({{resource_id | shortId}})
AUDIT#_LOAD_BALANCER_BIND_FLOATIP: Update Load Balancer ({{resource_id | shortId}}) IP to ({{target_id | shortId}})
AUDIT#_LOAD_BALANCER_BIND_SECURITY_GROUP: Update Load Balancer ({{resource_id | shortId}}) Security Group to ({{target_id | shortId}})
AUDIT#_RESOURCE_POOL_CREATE: Create Resource Pool {{args.name}}({{resource_id | shortId}}), params: {{args.protocol}} {{args.lb_algorithm | translate}}, status: {{args.admin_state_up ? 'Enable' : 'Disable'}}
AUDIT#_RESOURCE_POOL_UPDATE: Update Resource Pool {{args.name}}({{resource_id | shortId}}), params: {{args.protocol}} {{args.lb_algorithm | translate}}, status: {{args.admin_state_up ? 'Enable' : 'Disable'}}
AUDIT#_RESOURCE_POOL_BIND_VM: Add Machine ({{target_id | shortId}}) to Resource Pool ({{resource_id | shortId}}), Port {{args.protocol_port}}, Weight {{args.weight}}, status: {{args.admin_state_up ? 'Enable' : 'Disable'}}
AUDIT#_RESOURCE_POOL_UNBIND_VM: Remove Machine ({{target_id | shortId}}) from Resource Pool ({{resource_id | shortId}})
AUDIT#_RESOURCE_POOL_UPDATE_VM: Update Machine ({{target_id | shortId}}) config from Resource Pool ({{resource_id | shortId}}), Port {{args.protocol_port}}, Weight {{args.weight}}, status: {{args.admin_state_up ? 'Enable' : 'Disable'}}
AUDIT#_LOAD_BALANCER_CREATE_LISTENER: Create Listener {{args.name}}({{target_id | shortId}}) for Load Balancer ({{resource_id | shortId}}), Params: Protocal {{args.protocol}} Port {{args.protocol_port}} Max Conn. {{args.connection_limit}} Keep Alive {{!!keep_alive}} Resource Pool {{args.default_pool_id | shortId}}
AUDIT#_LISTENER_UPDATE: Update Listener {{args.name}}({{resource_id | shortId}}), Params: Status {{args.admin_state_up ? '启用' : '禁用'}} Protocal {{args.protocol}} Port {{args.protocol_port}} Max Cnn. {{args.connection_limit}} Keep Alive {{!!keep_alive}} Resource Pool {{args.default_pool_name}}({{args.default_pool_id | shortId}})
ESTMITE_BILL_WARINING: (This page shows daily average cost estimates, for reference only, actual cost will be subject to monthly bills)
